entry.summary: Re @pressstartcap 🙌 We're so excited to be partnering with the @pressstartcap team! 👉🎮 🧢 is a pre-seed Web3 fund founded by builders with exits. They invest in the “full stack” of Web3: from infrastructure & dev-tools to game studios to liquid NFTs. https://buff.ly/3niLici

entry.title: Re @pressstartcap Not a member of Developer DAO? 👉 The fellowship program is open to the larger Developer DAO community and is not restricted to me...
entry.summary: Re @pressstartcap Not a member of Developer DAO? 👉 The fellowship program is open to the larger Developer DAO community and is not restricted to members. If any non-members are selected for the fellowship, we'll provide them a sponsorship of 400 $CODE to admit them into the DAO.

entry.title: Re @pressstartcap 📅 The program will run for 6 weeks, and fellows will receive mentorship from experts in: 🛠️ Product 📈 Growth 🧑‍💻 En...
entry.summary: Re @pressstartcap 📅 The program will run for 6 weeks, and fellows will receive mentorship from experts in: 🛠️ Product 📈 Growth 🧑‍💻 Engineering 🎆 Concluding with a Demo Day for fellows to present to a community of investors and partners!

entry.title: Re @pressstartcap 🌟Fellowship participants will receive: ✅ First check ($15k) using YC’s MFN SAFE and a token side letter ✅ Mentorship from expe...
entry.summary: Re @pressstartcap 🌟Fellowship participants will receive: ✅ First check ($15k) using YC’s MFN SAFE and a token side letter ✅ Mentorship from experienced founders ✅ Perks such as company incorporation, priority banking, free merch store, discounted legal, discounted API access, etc.

entry.title: Re @pressstartcap 🥳 The fellowship program offers first checks, mentorship, and perks to aspiring Web3 builders to bridge them to top accelerators,...
entry.summary: Re @pressstartcap 🥳 The fellowship program offers first checks, mentorship, and perks to aspiring Web3 builders to bridge them to top accelerators, downstream investors, and customers. We're committed to seeding the next generation of Web3 builders and entrepreneurs!

entry.summary: RT conner 🚄 ✺ ⌐◨-◨ TBAs + SBTs = TBTs The union of token-bound accounts and soul-bound tokens create *token-bound tokens*, a perfect primitive for adding reputation on top of token-based membership for DAOs.
